title: Enroll Customer in EV Managed Charging
description: A customer with a new electric vehicle wants to enroll in a program where the utility manages their charging to occur during off-peak hours in exchange for a lower rate.

tasks.description: Explain the benefits of the managed charging program, including cost savings and grid benefits.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly communicates the program's value proposition.

tasks.description: Verify the customer's EV model and home charger are compatible with the utility's control platform.
Guide the customer through the process of connecting their EV or charger account to the utility's platform.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides clear instructions for the customer to authorize the connection.

tasks.description: Enroll the customer in the program and update their billing rate.
